thread.title: Neha Dhupia visits Lord's cricket ground
thread.title_full: Neha Dhupia visits Lord's cricket ground - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Neha Dhupia visits Lord's cricket ground
text:
Actress Neha Dhupia, who is in London for the India Fashion Week London 2015, took some time off from her busy schedule to visit the world famous Lord's cricket ground along with her mother.

Neha Dhupia 
Neha took to Instagram on Thursday to share a photograph of her at the cricket ground.
 
  A photo posted by @nehadhupia onOct 15, 2015 at 12:39am PDT
"Mom and me at #lordscricketground @homeofcricket. Thank you for the wonderful day," she posted on Instagram.
During her visit to the famous ground, Neha also learned some cricketing tips by reminiscing the moves of cricket legends like W.G. Grace. She even got a chance to have a sneak peek into the balcony of the teams' dressing room.
 
  A photo posted by @nehadhupia onOct 15, 2015 at 12:48am PDT
In another post, she shared: "Learning some cricketing tips from man himself #wggrace ... Do I look like a pro? @imangadbedi.
 
  A photo posted by @nehadhupia onOct 15, 2015 at 12:55am PDT
"#lordscricketground @homeofcricket... In the visiting teams dressing room balcony! #socool."
